verses.refrain: Turn your eyes upon Jesus, Look full in His wonderful face; And the things of earth will grow strangely dim In the light of His glory and grace.
verses.verse: O soul, are you weary and troubled? No light in the darkness you see? There's light for a look at the Savior, And life more abundant and free!
Through death into life everlasting He passed, and we follow Him there; Over us sin no more hath dominion, For more than conqu'rors we are!
His word shall not fail you He promised; Believe Him and all will be well: Then go to a world that is dying, His perfect salvation to tell!
